name: GEOTRA
description:
In this colorful twin-stick shooter inspired by 2000's-era Flash games, survive several waves of uniquely deadly enemies with your wits and skill. Choose wisely from a tree of upgrades after each wave to refine your strategy and bring down your foes. Live to see what lies at the end of the horde.

Fight

Choose from two unique classes to take down your foes.

Upgrade

Collect upgrade points after each wave to spend on a plethora of different upgrades.

Survive

Each wave, the enemies get tougher and more varied. Adaptability is essential to success.

Multiple Campaigns

Download and play through campaigns made by other players or make your own in the wave editor.


Attributions:
Trailer music - SOUND AIRYLUVS by ISAo
